questions.question: Made a low and deep sound because of hunger
Threw the food out of the mouth with force
Food with an un-usual and un-pleasant taste
(Write) What did mother ask the family when they came down-staris? Why?
answers: if they knew what chips were
because foreign soldires asked her to cook chips

questions.question: (Write) Why was the family surprised when they opened the sack?
answers: Sack was full of big new patatoes
they had not seen huge number of potatoes

questions.question: (Write) Why did mother wante the children to sit still?
answers: Did not want soldiers to be disturbed

questions.question: (Write) She build a fire in the grate. Who is she in the above line
(Write) Come on lets leave. Who said these line and to whome
answers: grandma said this line to her friend
mother said this line to her kids
dark hair soldier said this line to his friend

questions.question: What did the family do after soldiers left?
answers: added potato peels to the soup
diped rye bread into soup and ate

questions.question: What did the family do to make soup special
answers: children brought  juicy mushrooms and berries
grandma added some herbs to the pot
They added all ingredients to make soup special
